title: What will be the output of the following arithmetic expression, 5+3*2%10-8*6? - Quora

response.answer_text: It depends on your solving method 1:- If you use BODMAS, then it will become [math]5+3×2/100×10-8×6[/math] [math]=5+3×0.2-8×6[/math] [math]=5+0.6-48[/math] [math]=5.6-48[/math] [math]=43.6[/math] 2:-If you don't use BODMAS and solve it left to right it is [math] 5+3×2/100×10–8×6[/math] [math]=8×2/100×10–8×6[/math] [math]=16/100×10–8×6[/math] [math]=1.6–8×6[/math] [math]= -6.4×6[/math] [math]= -38.4[/math] Both answers are totally different.
